title: Indian IT companies may earn more from third party items sale
description: India's top IT firms TCS, Infosys, and Birlasoft are likely to report a surge in pass-through revenue, driven by strategic partnerships with third-party sellers, when they announce quarterly earnings next week.
content: IT firms in India are increasingly partnering with third-party sellers to boost their revenue. While most of them have a pass-through revenue component, analysts expect top companies like TCS, Infosys and Birlasoft to announce higher pass-through revenue in the quarterly earnings season that begins next week.
